attributes.action: permit UK military personnel to participate in the Cycle To Work Scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, UK military personnel are being disadvantaged by not being able to be part of the Cycle To Work Scheme. MOD personnel are actively encouraged to take part in this scheme but this does not cover military personnel. Military personnel are expected to keep up high levels of fitness and one way of doing so is by cycling. Many military Units have limited car parking spaces and Commanders are encouraging personnel to cycle to work. Active participation for military personnel within this Cycle To Work Scheme would enhance personal fitness, cut down on emmissions and reduce traffic activity.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "permit UK military personnel to participate in the Cycle To Work Scheme."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20241


Prime Minister's Office
